sentence.Network_en: Their land looked so unpromising that the colonists eventually gave most of it back.
sentence.Network_cn: 他们的土地看上去日后没什么用途，所以殖民者最终把大部分都归还给了他们。

sentence.Network_en: It is a tribute to Mr Chandler's skill that he has fashioned a fascinating book out of such unpromising material.
sentence.Network_cn: 钱德勒先生竟然以如此不被看好的素材写出了一本引人入胜的书，这充分证明了他的写作技巧。

sentence.Network_en: In fact, his business career had distinctly unpromising beginnings.
sentence.Network_cn: 事实上，他的经商生涯从初期就明显前景暗淡。

list.abs: faced an unpromising task ; music for unpromising combinations of instruments ., 应付一项没有希望的任务 ; 把乐器毫无希望的组合在一起的音乐.
It also diverts computational cycles away from unpromising areas ., 它还把计算周期转移出没有希望的区.
Tintin was born in this unpromising environment , in a weekly children ' s supplement , Le Petit Vingtieme ., 丁丁就是在这种毫无希望的环境中诞生的 , 最初刊载于二十世纪报的每周儿童副刊上.

even the most unpromising rooms in Mr Bryson's rectory provide food for thought , as the miserable provision made for the servants , an all but the grand old days of yore .即使在布莱森先生家里最不起眼的房间，也有能引人深思，比如做给仆人们的寒碜的食物，虽然微不足道，但也尽显昔日的气派。

entry.def: If you describe something as unpromising, you think that it is unlikely to be successful or produce anything good in the future.

example.ex: In fact, his business career had distinctly unpromising beginnings...
example.tran: 事实上，他的经商生涯从初期就明显前景暗淡。

example.ex: Their land looked so unpromising that the colonists eventually gave most of it back.
example.tran: 他们的土地看上去日后没什么用途，所以殖民者最终把大部分都归还给了他们。

means.word_mean: 1. appearing to be unlikely to result favorably or be enjoyable;

auth_sentence.content: But the underpinnings of Hemingway's style seem especially unpromising.
auth_sentence.res_content: But the underpinnings of Hemingway's style seem especially unpromising.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: But the underpinnings of Hemingway's style seem especially unpromising.

auth_sentence.content: Her apprentice work was conventional and unpromising, rather stilted.
auth_sentence.res_content: Her apprentice work was conventional and unpromising, rather stilted.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Her apprentice work was conventional and unpromising, rather stilted.

auth_sentence.content: Dry uplands planted with unpromising soil.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Dry uplands planted with unpromising soil.
